column3: The Mighty Gym - VR Fitness Experience
column5: Would love to show of our innovative VR Fitness Facility that we have build in VRChat!
column6: A REAL Gym experience in VR - a theme park for fitness!
column15: Just the access to the platform and the audience would be amazing! Nothing needed!
column24: Thanks for considering our gym! I would love to showcase the awesome fitness facility we built in VRChat but I would also be down to do a panel / talk about VR fitness, and also as a content creator in general.
I have been a content creator for VR for many years in the past, and you can find me on any social media platform as @Kugothemighty!
